11511.content:
Tori and Trina were bored in their apartment.

Then Tori brought up the idea to play truth or dare.

Trina agreed as she had nothing else to do.

So Tori and Trina sat in front of each other and started the game.

Trina was the first to go.

Trina asked Tori, "Truth or dare?"

Tori said, "Dare, not expecting anything too crazy."

Trina said, "Mess yourself."

Tori's face went to the shade of crimson. Fine, she relented.

Trina smelt the foul odor moments later.

Trina laughed.

Tori then asked Trina, "Truth or dare?"

Trina said, "Truth."

Tori asked, "Why did you dare me to mess my pants?"

Trina replied, "I thought it would be funny."

Trina then asked Tori, "Truth or dare?"

Tori replied,"Dare, not thinking that Trina could do anything worse."

Trina smiled wickedly,"Wear and use diapers for the next two months of summer, starting next week."

11522.content:
Trina smiled deviously at the picture in her hands, or rather on her phone.

Oh when Tori gets home she will be in for a rude awakening.

Moments later, Tori walked in.

Trina heard Tori come in.

Trina turned around and showed Tori the picture.

Tori was shocked at the picture in her sister's hands.

Where did you get that?

Doesn't matter because now you will do what I say or this picture will be sent to everyone at school.

Tori begged her sister not to.

Trina said don't worry I won't, so long as you do what I say.

Tori meekly nodded.

Good, so from now on you will follow these rules:

1. You are to put all your underwear and lingerie in plastic tubs, including the ones your wearing.
You may keep your bras. But your panties must go.

2. You will put the tubs in the basement.

3. When we are alone you will speak in short childish sentences.

4. You will wear diapers when you are at school under your new uniform.

5. Your uniform will be payed out the night before.

6. You will strip down to your diaper, as soon as you step inside this apartment.

7. You are to wear nothing over your diaper at home, unless I give you permission.

122.content:
Cat's parents had trouble potty training Cat when she was young so they decided to keep her in diapers because it would be easier than cleaning up her accidents.

Cat's mom, dad, and brother were going on a trip and would be gone for a month so Cat is staying at Tori's house. One night, after dinner, Cat was in the bathroom changing her very wet diaper. She did not notice that she hadn't locked the door. Cat could not figure out which way to put on the diaper. She had it on backwards and the tapes were in the back. She taped it and stood up, she couldn't figure out why the back was thinner than the front. While she was thinking, Tori walked in.
"Cat, why are you wearing a diaper?" Tori asked
Cat explained that she wasn't potty trained. Cat started crying.
"don't worry Cat, it's fine, but it looks like you need some help" Tori said
"why?" cat asked
"your diaper is backwards" tori said
Cat

1242.content: All Cat Could Think about on the way home was DIAPERS. She Thought Of How They Feel, How They Smelt. How The Crinkle Sounded. All these thought hung on her mind. With all these thoughts cat slowly drifted off to sleep. In Her Dream She Was In Her House, Laying Down On The Couch like normal, but something was different. She wasnt wearing her panties anymore. She was in a white crinkly baby diaper. She blushed at the site of it and how childish she looked. She Then Suddenly got a familiar urge. She had to use The Bathroom, and it was BAD. She quickly tried to get up to run to the bathroom, but as soon as she stood up she froze. Cat let out a loud wet fart and she knew what was happening. Quickly after that she felt a slam of mushy poop escaping into her newly soiled diaper. The diaped went from a crinkly white to a dirty brown and yellow. She fell down in her sticky mess and started crying. She couldnt stand the smell of her mushy poopy mees. With this shock, She Woke Up.

Realizing she had actually infact pooped all over her favorite paid of mint green panties. She sat there crying and rocking back and forth, further squishing her poopy mess.

1541.content: Why would Cat and Jade be in diapers?
1541.title: Cat And Jade

15411.content:
Secretly, Jade and Cat both liked to wear diapers and be treated like babies.
They'd do this when no one else was around.
One day when they were diapering each other, someone caught them.
It was...
15411.title: Both Like Them

choices: Wanting To Take Care Of Them...
154111.content:
Tori found them diapering each other.
She didn't know what to say at first.
Both explained it to her. Their parents were never around, so, acting like infants gave them something to do while they were over at each others houses some times.
Tori's reaction was...

Wanting to take care of them.

Tease them.
154111.title: Tori

1541111.content:
She didn't laugh, which they expected.
Instead, she offered to take care of them.
"Vega, you'd do that?"
"Of course, Jade."
Cat grinned.
Tori waited until they were finished diapering each other, and explained her plan, which was...
1541111.title: Wanting To Take Care Of Them...

15411112.content:
It turned out she had a science project to work on, and she'd found her test subjects.
The project involved...
15411112.title: She had a special "science project"

154111122.content:
She decided that she would transform them into babies. Cat agreed almot immediately, but it took some coaxing for jade. "Don't Spank Me Vega" said jade as she finally agreed
How would she do the transformation?
154111122.title: Transforming them into babies

choices: Jade Wanted To Be 1, Cat Wanted To Be A Newborn
Cat Wanted To Be 2 and Jade wanted to be 3 months
1541111222.content:
She had a special age setting watch.
Cat and Jade would select what age they'd like to be.
?They chose to be different ages.
They chose...
1541111222.title: A Special "age setting" watch

15411112222.content:
Cat wanted to be 2 years old, while Jade wanted to be 3 months.
Tori agreed.
She set the watch for their ages, and activated it.
It took ___ for them to become their new ages.
15411112222.title: Cat Wanted To Be 2 and Jade wanted to be 3 months

154111122221.content:
They felt themselves shrink minute by minute. Their clothes shrank with them. They got smaller and smaller and 30 minutes later, they were the ages they'd been set to.
Were they de-aged mentally as well?
154111122221.title: 30 Minutes

1541111222211.content:
They had also regressed mentally.
The now 2 year old Cat hugged Tori.
"Mama."
"Mommy's here."
Tori grinned.
Her first thing to do was...
1541111222211.title: Yes

15411112222111.content:
Tori Decided That She Should probrolly get the girls changed
Tori bought some packages of diapers, and set to work diapering them.
She diapered who first?
15411112222111.title: Diaper Them

choices: Was Nervous and Kicked and Cried
154111122221112.content:
Tori Decided Since Jade Was Younger, She Needed Diapers First
She diapered Jade first, who cooperated Only letting out a small amout of "goo goos" and "gaa gaas".
Cat was next.
Cat...
154111122221112.title: Jade

1541111222211122.content:
Cat was scared, and kicked and cried as Tori tried to diaper her.
"Sweetie, it's okay."
"No, mommy."
"Kitty, it's alright."
Tori didn't want to spank Cat, but she knew she had to calm her down.
She...

Sang to her.

Other.
1541111222211122.title: Was Nervous and Kicked and Cried

15411112222111222.content:
She fed her some leftover fruit she'd found in the fridge, which was able to calm Cat downwhile Tori finished diapering her.
"There we go, now you're in your diaper and you look so cute."
Cat blushed
Someone knocked on the door as she was finishing it was...
15411112222111222.title: Decided To feed her
